description:
A configurable Windows status bar.

A configurable Windows status bar.
New Features
- add OBS WebSocket integration and widget 
- add WHKD widget for displaying keybinds 
Bugfixes
- enhance workspace_update event with event type 
- Fix for MoveWindow event from Komorebi 
- adjust OBS WebSocket logger level based on DEBUG 
- Remove unnecessary code in ActiveWindowWidget 
Refactors
- remove duplicate callback registration 
- Update workspace and active window event handling 
Other Changes
- Update README.md with list of available widgets in YASB
Full Changelog: https://github.com/amnweb/yasb/compare/v1.2.5...v1.2.6
